tool_description: The Daily Rashifal API provides up-to-date horoscope predictions for all twelve Rashis (Zodiac Signs) based on Vedic astrology.
name: Daily Rashifal API
title: Daily Rashifal API

api_list.name: Get Rashifal for all Rashis
api_list.description: It gets today rashifal for all twelve rashis.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Rashifal by Rashi
api_list.description: It gets today rashifal for the given rashi.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/aries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/{rashi}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
